entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, Stettler
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:10 PM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stettler 1:00 PM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Temperature: -6.3°C
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -7.3°C
Wind: SSW 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
